post.text:
"It's a good thing Trump isn't in charge of the law in this country." -Hillary Clinton

"Yeah, because you'd be in jail." -Donald Trump

comment.author: Tori
comment.text: I am female, over 50 and from the midwest and I fully support Trump. Stop making a fricken issue out of locker room speak that happened more then 10 years ago.

replies.author: Kylie
replies.text: So talking about sexually assaulting women is acceptable as long as the man calls it "locker room" talk?

replies.author: Anna
replies.text: Kylie hey idiot don't worry about talk...worry about actions... you know defending a rapist of a 12 year old by saying she wanted it. What is wrong with you?

replies.author: Kylie
replies.text: Anna J. , I see that like Donald you can't have a conversation without name calling and making assumptions, that's very sad.
